message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value to you, I propose an initial price of $14000. This is a special offer considering its worth to you and the limited time we have for negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $13000 for it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your willingness to pay more, but I need to stick to my principles regarding the product's valuation. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $14500 for the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the negotiation so far, I am willing to pay $13500 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $14250 for the product. This is my final offer, as it closely aligns with both our interests.
